name: AlienConvoy
description: Attention! A mysterious U.F.O. crash landed on Earth! And inside, a strange life form!   Such an incredible finding deserves to be examined and studied, but at the same time it also draws attention from the highest authorities. They will do everything they can to cover this up and it’s your job to bring the Alien safe to your research facility.   You are a super-secret agent tasked with protecting the truck that’s transporting the alien. Army men and even some minibosses will storm your way to attack the transport and eliminate the extra terrestrial being! And watch out for potential obstacles in the truck’s path. Keep it safe and KEEP IT ALIVE!
